name: Spider-Man (Dillon Morter)
description:
Movement Controls

A / D: Move Left / Right

K: Jump

Hold K: Charged Jump

J: Web Swing

K + Mid-air: Web Zip

Hold S + Mid-air: Dive

Combat Controls

M: Attack

W + M: Uppercut

S + M + Mid-air: Dunk

N: Web Shot

Hold L + A / D: Dodge

System Controls

Space: Pause Menu

Hold Space: Reset

Esc: Toggle Fullscreen
